{"id":636957920,"question_id":258,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 8 months","timestamp":1644299556,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/636957920/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Digits","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int addDigits(int num) {\n        int sum = 0 ;\n        while(num)\n        {\n            sum += num % 10;\n            num /= 10;\n            \n            if(num < 10) \n            {\n                sum += num % 10;\n                if(sum < 10) break;\n                num = sum;\n                sum = 0;\n                \n            }\n        }\n        return sum;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-digits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
